goodMorningGreetings: Top of the morning to ya'll!
Mornin Champs! Let's go get that bread!
I hope you got a good night's sleep!
goodMorningMemos: Never accept the world as it appears to be. Dare to see it for what it could be.
Just because the past didn't turn out like you wanted it to doesn't mean your future can't be better than you imagined. Today is a new day
Today is going to be a stress free day!
You may be the only person left who believes in you, but it's enough. It takes just one star to pierce a universe of darkness. Never give up.
It doesn’t matter what day of the week is, how you’re feeling, or what’s going on in your life—time will always move forward, one day at a time
The past makes you wanna die out of regret and future makes you depressed out of anxiety. So by elimination, the present is likely the happiest time.
When you feel like giving up, remember why you held on for so long in the first place
This world ain’t an easy one to live in, but I can’t let every little thing bring me down. After all, there’s something I want to accomplish here!
Just because the past didn't turn out like you wanted it to doesn't mean your future can't be better than you imagined.
You have to fight through some bad days to earn the best days of your life.
You're the cheese to my macaroni 💕
